description.en: The Malaysian Economic Indicators presents current economic information with the purpose of monitoring the economic situation of the country on a monthly basis. It consists of Leading, Coincident and Lagging indicators for Composite and Diffusion Indexes.
description.bm: Penerbitan Penunjuk Ekonomi Malaysia ini memberikan maklumat ekonomi semasa yang bertujuan untuk memantau kedudukan ekonomi Negara. Ia terdiri daripada Indeks Pelopor, Serentak dan Susulan bagi Indeks Komposit dan Indeks Difusi yang diterbitkan secara bulanan.

variables.name: leading
variables.desc_en: [Float] The Leading Index measures anticipations of the overall economic activity in the months ahead. The index tells us where the economy is going.
variables.desc_bm: [Apung] Indeks Pelopor merupakan ukuran jangkaan keseluruhan aktiviti ekonomi untuk masa hadapan. Indeks ini memberitahu kita ke mana arah tuju ekonomi.

variables.name: coincident
variables.desc_en: [Float] The Coincident Index is a comprehensive measure of the overall current economic performance.
variables.desc_bm: [Apung] Indeks Serentak merupakan ukuran komprehensif terhadap prestasi keseluruhan ekonomi semasa.

variables.name: lagging
variables.desc_en: [Float] The Lagging Index is to validate the signal of the Leading and Coincident Indexes
variables.desc_bm: [Apung] Indeks Susulan berfungsi sebagai pengesah kepada isyarat Indeks Pelopor dan Indeks Serentak.

variables.name: leading_diffusion
variables.desc_en: [Float] The Diffusion Index is a complement to the Composite Index. It is used to assist in making a decision especially in determining turning point of economic cycle. The value of 100 for Diffusion Index implies that all components are increasing and the value of zero shows that all components are decreasing.
variables.desc_bm: [Apung] Indeks Difusi adalah pelengkap kepada Indeks Komposit. Ia digunakan untuk membantu membuat keputusan terutamanya dalam penentuan titik pusing kitaran ekonomi. Nilai 100 bagi Indeks Difusi menunjukkan semua komponen meningkat dan nilai sifar bermaksud semua komponen mengalami penurunan.

variables.name: coincident_diffusion
variables.desc_en: [Float] The Diffusion Index is a complement to the Composite Index. It is used to assist in making a decision especially in determining turning point of economic cycle. The value of 100 for Diffusion Index implies that all components are increasing and the value of zero shows that all components are decreasing
variables.desc_bm: [Apung] Indeks Difusi adalah pelengkap kepada Indeks Komposit. Ia digunakan untuk membantu membuat keputusan terutamanya dalam penentuan titik pusing kitaran ekonomi. Nilai 100 bagi Indeks Difusi menunjukkan semua komponen meningkat dan nilai sifar bermaksud semua komponen mengalami penurunan.

en.methodology: Data for the compilation of Composite and Diffusion Indexes is obtained from the Department of Statistics Malaysia and the following agencies: (i) Ministry of Housing and Local Government (MHLG); (ii) Bank Negara Malaysia (BNM); (iii) Road Transport Department (RTD); (iv) Malaysian Investment Development Authority (MIDA); and (v) Employees Provident Fund (EPF).
en.caveat: The Leading Index is unable to measure or predict the magnitude of any changes of economic activity. The index shows the direction of the economy in advance. The economic indicators are unable to take into account the internal or/and external shock to the economy.
en.publication: [Malaysian Economic Indicators, January 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-01_mei.pdf), the latest edition of the leading, coincident, and lagging composite indices published monthly by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on these composite indices](https://open.dosm.gov.my/composite-indices).

bm.methodology: Data bagi penyediaan Indeks Komposit dan Indeks Difusi diperoleh daripada Jabatan Perangkaan Malaysia serta agensi berikut: (i) Kementerian Perumahan dan Kerajaan Tempatan (KPKT); (ii) Bank Negara Malaysia (BNM); (iii) Jabatan Pengangkutan Jalan (JPJ); (iv) Lembaga Pembangunan Pelaburan Malaysia (MIDA); dan (v) Kumpulan Wang Simpanan Pekerja (KWSP).
bm.caveat: Indeks Pelopor tidak dapat mengukur atau meramal perubahan magnitud dalam aktiviti ekonomi. Indeks ini hanya menunjukkan arah tuju ekonomi di masa hadapan. Sistem penunjuk ekonomi tidak berupaya untuk mengambil kira kejutan pengaruh dalaman atau/dan luaran kepada ekonomi.
bm.publication: [Penunjuk Ekonomi Malaysia, Januari 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-01_mei.pdf), edisi terkini bagi indeks komposit pelopor, serentak, dan susulan yang diterbitkan secara bulanan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM sendiri juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang indeks komposit](https://open.dosm.gov.my/composite-indices).

en.methodology: Data for the compilation of Composite and Diffusion Indexes is obtained from the Department of Statistics Malaysia and the following agencies: (i) Ministry of Housing and Local Government (MHLG); (ii) Bank Negara Malaysia (BNM); (iii) Road Transport Department (RTD); (iv) Malaysian Investment Development Authority (MIDA); and (v) Employees Provident Fund (EPF).
en.caveat: The Coincident Index does not represent the level of the current economic situation. Thus it should not be interpreted as the level of current monthly Gross Domestic Product (GDP). The economic indicators are unable to take into account internal or/and external shocks to the economy.
en.publication: [Malaysian Economic Indicators, January 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-01_mei.pdf), the latest edition of the leading, coincident, and lagging composite indices published monthly by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on these composite indices](https://open.dosm.gov.my/composite-indices).

bm.methodology: Data bagi penyediaan Indeks Komposit dan Indeks Difusi diperoleh daripada Jabatan Perangkaan Malaysia serta agensi berikut: (i) Kementerian Perumahan dan Kerajaan Tempatan (KPKT); (ii) Bank Negara Malaysia (BNM); (iii) Jabatan Pengangkutan Jalan (JPJ); (iv) Lembaga Pembangunan Pelaburan Malaysia (MIDA); dan (v) Kumpulan Wang Simpanan Pekerja (KWSP).
bm.caveat: Indeks Serentak tidak menggambarkan tahap situasi ekonomi semasa. Justeru itu, ia tidak boleh ditafsirkan sebagai aras Keluaran Dalam Negeri Kasar (KDNK) semasa bulanan. Sistem penunjuk ekonomi tidak berupaya untuk mengambil kira kejutan pengaruh dalaman atau/dan luaran kepada ekonomi.
bm.publication: [Penunjuk Ekonomi Malaysia, Januari 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-01_mei.pdf), edisi terkini bagi indeks komposit pelopor, serentak, dan susulan yang diterbitkan secara bulanan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM sendiri juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang indeks komposit](https://open.dosm.gov.my/composite-indices).

en.methodology: Data for the compilation of Composite and Diffusion Indexes is obtained from the Department of Statistics Malaysia and the following agencies: (i) Ministry of Housing and Local Government (MHLG); (ii) Bank Negara Malaysia (BNM); (iii) Road Transport Department (RTD); (iv) Malaysian Investment Development Authority (MIDA); and (v) Employees Provident Fund (EPF).
en.caveat: The economic indicators are unable to take into account internal or/and external shocks to the economy.
